action.name: Volley Fire
entries: Select a 40ft cube within 300 feet. Every creature in that cube must make a {@dc 14} dexterity saving throw or take  {@damage 2d8 + 2} damage(or {@damage 1d8 + 1} damage if the militia has less than half of its maximum hit points).

trait.name: Routed
entries: If a militia block is reduced to less than half of its maximum hit points, it must make a DC12 wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to move its movement speed away from the source of the damage. If the militia block fails by more than 5, it scatters and is neutralized.

trait.name: Tightly packed
entries: If a militia block is effected by an area of effect attack, the amount of damage is multiplied by the number of squares overlapping with it, maximum 6.
A militia is a group of men trained to fire crossbows in volleys. They are the backbone of armies that lack skilled archers.
